SELECT referer, count(*) as Hits, sip, city, stk //, uri
FROM betslip.win:time(7 seconds)
WHERE (referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx"
// uncomment the LIKE commands below to restrict only betslip versions
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=__"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=1__"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=2__"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=3__"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=40_"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=41_"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=42_"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=43_"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=44_"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=45_"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=46_"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=47_"
OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=48_"
//OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=5__"
//OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=6__"
//OR referer LIKE "%/betslip/WebInterface/BsInterface.aspx?v=7__"
)
AND NOT blocked
GROUP BY sip
//HAVING count(*) >1
OUTPUT last every 7 seconds
//

?v=[version number] is less than X can be uncommented

select count(*) as hits, sip, uqid, userAgent, referer, xForwardedFor, stkip, stk, uri, inflight, orgName,carrierName, country, method,
CASE WHEN current_timestamp().get('seconds') < 10 THEN current_timestamp().format() || ':0' || cast(current_timestamp().get('seconds'), string) ELSE current_timestamp().format() || ':' || cast(current_timestamp().get('seconds'), string) END as time
from sportsBook.win:time(60 seconds)
where uri LIKE '%/extra/en/results-and-archive/results/%'
group by sip
Having  count(*) > 26
output last every 60 seconds
liveMonitors.queryDescription: Blocking behavior for users hitting the extra results page in a malicious way - making over 30 calls per min from the same IP. This behaviour is causing 80%+ CPU loading on the Pippin DB

liveMonitors.topic: FRM A - Jump in Failed Logins
liveMonitors.queryBody:
EXPRESSION LogStatus alias for {lok="Login Failed"}
EXPRESSION countlok alias for {count(lok)}
SELECT
(SELECT countlok AS LoginFailedCurrentMinute
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE LogStatus)
,
( (SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(2 minute)
WHERE LogStatus) -
(SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE LogStatus) ) AS LoginFailedPreviousMinute
,
current_timestamp().format() as time

FROM NewLoginDefault

HAVING 
(SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE LogStatus) *3 >
(SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(2 minute)
WHERE LogStatus)  *2

AND (SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE LogStatus) >100

OUTPUT last at (*/1, *, *, *, *)
liveMonitors.queryDescription: Alerts - If the failed login count doubles and the failed login count is greater than 100. Used to identify the start time of an attack.

externalCalloutObjects.name: FRM - Email Alert - Failed Logins
externalCalloutObjects.description:
send an email if:
The Failed Logins per min doubles compared to the previous minute
And the number of failed logins per minute is greater than 100

SELECT count(*) as hits, tags, userAgent, sip, uname, lok, country, city, referer, serverName, orgName, current_timestamp().format() as time, count(distinct stk) as uniqueSTK, rstk, loginDomain
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(10 seconds)
WHERE  userAgent IN (
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/61.0.3163.100 Safari/537.36',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/61.0.3163.100 Safari/537.36',

'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/61.0.3163.100 Safari/537.36'
)
AND serverName = 'mobile.bet365.com'
AND not blocked
AND loginDomain = 'SportsBook'
AND referer IN ('https://mobile.bet365.com/',
'https://mobile.bet365.com/Default.aspx?ot=1&apptype=&appversion=')
AND AuthenticationMethod = 0
AND tags = 'NoUqid'
AND uri = 'https://mobile.bet365.com/members/lp/default.aspx'
//AND lok = 'Login Ok'
GROUP BY sip, uname
//HAVING count(distinct stk) = count(distinct uname)
//AND count(distinct stk) > 1
OUTPUT last every 10 seconds

liveMonitors.topic: FRM B - Unique failures per IP
liveMonitors.queryBody:
SELECT stk, tags as UQID, sip, window(uname), count(distinct uname) UniqueUserame, userAgent, count(distinct userAgent) as UniqueUserAgent, referer, count(distinct referer) as UniqueReferer, sum(CASE WHEN uname REGEXP "^.*[\\W].*[\\W\\S]$" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as InvalidUsernames, count(distinct stk) as uniqueSessionTokens,
CASE WHEN current_timestamp().get('seconds') < 10 THEN current_timestamp().format() || ':0' || cast(current_timestamp().get('seconds'), string) ELSE current_timestamp().format() || ':' || cast(current_timestamp().get('seconds'), string) END as time
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE lok = 'Login Failed'
AND tags = 'NoUqid'
AND NOT blocked
GROUP BY sip
HAVING count(distinct uname) > 7
liveMonitors.queryDescription: Blocking - Greater than 7 unique username login failures in 1 minute by an IP with no UQID

liveMonitors.queryBody:
SELECT uname as UserName, sip, lok as LoginStatus, tags as UQID, count(*) as AllLoginsAttemptedPerMin, userAgent, stk,
CASE WHEN current_timestamp().get('seconds') < 10 THEN current_timestamp().format() || ':0' || cast(current_timestamp().get('seconds'), string) ELSE current_timestamp().format() || ':' || cast(current_timestamp().get('seconds'), string) END as time
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 second)
WHERE uname REGEXP "^.*[\\W].*[\\W\\S]$"  //this works including ignores spaces at the end of a uname
AND uname <> 'Not Available'
OUTPUT LAST EVERY 1 SECOND
liveMonitors.queryDescription: Investigation - Login attempts with invalid username. Looks for characters not permitted in a user name e.g. @$&

liveMonitors.queryBody:
SELECT count(*) as Logins, count(distinct sip) as IPAddresses, count(distinct stk) as SessionTokens, count(distinct tags) as UQIDs, 
sum(CASE WHEN uname REGEXP "^.*[\\W].*[\\W\\S]$" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as InvalidUserNames,
sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Failed" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as FailedLogins,
current_timestamp().format() as Time,
userAgent || ',' || uri || ',' || referer || ',' || serverName || ',' || loginDomain || ',' || tags as CombinedAttributes
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
//WHERE tags <> 'NoUqid'
GROUP BY userAgent || ',' || uri || ',' || referer || ',' || serverName || ',' || loginDomain || ',' || tags
OUTPUT last every 60 seconds
ORDER BY sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Failed" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DESC
LIMIT 10
liveMonitors.queryDescription:
Investigation - Top 10 UserAgents attempting to login in the last minute. Helps to work out the common attributes of an unknown distributed attack.

liveMonitors.topic: FRM M - Chrome46 UA -- MC Fraud
liveMonitors.queryBody:
SELECT count(*) as numHits, uname, lok as LoginStatus, stkip, sip, screenres, userAgent, stk, orgName, carrierName, city, country, referer
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 seconds)
WHERE country = 'United Kingdom'    // / Country Names have now been updated
//AND lok = 'Login Ok'
AND (
userAgent LIKE '%Android 5.1; VFD 200 Build%LMY47D%'
AND userAgent LIKE '%Chrome%46.0.2490.76 Mobile%'
)
GROUP BY sip,stk, userAgent, lok,uname
OUTPUT LAST EVERY 1 SECONDS
liveMonitors.queryDescription: Alerts - Known User Agent pattern matching attempting login identified as potentially malicious by FRM

SELECT country, ts.format() as time, referer, sip, stk, userAgent, orgName, carrierName, uri, serverHost
FROM MembersAuthenticated.win:time(1 seconds)
WHERE country = 'Italy'
AND userAgent in ('Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 5.1; LENNY2 Build/LMY47I; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/43.0.2357.121 Mobile Safari/537.36',
                               'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 5.0.1; GT-I9505 Build/LRX22C; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/45.0.2454.95 Mobile Safari/537.36'
                              )
OUTPUT all every 1 seconds
liveMonitors.queryDescription: Account activity for Italian chargeback group thats dumping funds in Poker thats evading our checks and changes behaviour when we do implement controls. Duplicate of: FRM A - Italian Chargeback Poker

liveMonitors.queryBody:
SELECT sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Failed" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as FailedLogins,
sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Ok" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as LoginOk,
Math.round((sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Failed" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / (sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Ok" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Failed" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) ) *10000 ) / 100  as LoginFailurePerc,
current_timestamp().format() as Time
//window(sip) as ContributingIP
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(60 seconds)
HAVING Math.round((sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Failed" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / (sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Ok" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + sum(CASE WHEN lok = "Login Failed" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) ) *10000 ) / 100  > 15
OUTPUT last every 60 seconds
liveMonitors.queryDescription: Sends an email alert when the login failure rate is higher than 15% (there is likely to be a login attack). DO NOT DELETE

liveMonitors.topic: NewLoginDefault - FRM - Failed Logins Per Min
liveMonitors.queryBody:
SELECT
CASE WHEN current_timestamp().get('seconds') < 10 THEN current_timestamp().format() || ':0' || cast(current_timestamp().get('seconds'), string) ELSE current_timestamp().format() || ':' || cast(current_timestamp().get('seconds'), string) END as time,
count(distinct uname) as DifferentUsernamesAttempted,
Math.round((count(distinct uname) / count(uname) ) *100) /100 as DifferentUsernamesPerLoginAttempt,
count(distinct sip) as DifferentIP,
Math.round((count(distinct sip) / count(sip) ) *100) /100 as DifferentIPsPerLoginAttempt,
count(distinct tags) as DifferentUQIDs,
Math.round((count(distinct tags) / count(tags) ) *100) /100 as DifferentUQIDsPerLoginAttempt,
sum(CASE WHEN lok LIKE "Login Failed" THEN 1 else 0 END) as LoginFailed,
sum(CASE WHEN lok LIKE "Login Ok" THEN 1 else 0 END) as LoginSuccessful,
Math.round((sum(CASE WHEN lok LIKE "Login Failed" THEN 1 else 0 END)  / sum(CASE WHEN lok LIKE "Login Ok" OR lok LIKE "Login Failed" THEN 1 else 0 END)) *10000) /100 as LoginFailedPercent,
sum(CASE WHEN uname REGEXP "^.*[\\W].*[\\W\\S]$" THEN 1 else 0 END) as InvalidLogins,
Math.round((sum(CASE WHEN uname REGEXP "^.*[\\W].*[\\W\\S]$" THEN 1 else 0 END)  / count(uname) ) *10000) /100 as InvalidLoginPercent
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE NOT blocked
OUTPUT last at (*/1, *, *, *, *)
//
liveMonitors.queryDescription:
NewLoginDefault | 1 minute | Grouped | FRM | Helps to identify when there is an attack: 
 LoginFailedPercent and DifferentUsernamesAttempted might go up, DifferentIPsPerLoginAttempt and DifferentUQIDsPerLoginAttempt might go down

liveMonitors.topic: NewLoginDefault - FRM - Jump in Failed Logins
liveMonitors.queryBody:
EXPRESSION LogStatus alias for {lok="Login Failed"}
EXPRESSION countlok alias for {count(lok)}
SELECT
(SELECT countlok AS LoginFailedCurrentMinute
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE LogStatus)
,
( (SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(2 minute)
WHERE LogStatus) -
(SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE LogStatus) ) AS LoginFailedPreviousMinute
,
current_timestamp().format() as time

FROM NewLoginDefault

HAVING 
(SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE LogStatus) *3 >
(SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(2 minute)
WHERE LogStatus)  *2

AND (SELECT countlok
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE LogStatus) >100

OUTPUT last at (*/1, *, *, *, *)
liveMonitors.queryDescription: NewLoginDefault | 1 minute | Grouped | FRM |  | current minute > previous minute X 2 | Compares the current failed logins per minute with the previous minute. If there is 100% jump in failed logins then it will populate

And the number of failed logins per minute is greater than 100

SELECT sip, userAgent, stk, city, country, uname, count(*) as hits, current_timestamp().format() as time, xForwardedFor, referer, uri, serverName, blocked,
sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() NOT LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as OpenAccount,
sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ValidateUsername,
sum (CASE WHEN uname <> 'Not Available' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as CompletedLogin
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(5 minute)

WHERE uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/%'       //all open account requests
AND userAgent IN (
'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 7_1_2 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/537.51.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Mobile/11D257 MicroMessenger/6.0.1 NetType/WIFI',

'Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 12.0',
'Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; SV1; QQDownload 732; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E; SE 2.X MetaSr 1.0)',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_7_0) AppleWebKit/535.11 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/17.0.963.56 Safari/535.11',
'Opera/9.27 (Windows NT 5.2; U; zh-cn)',
'Opera/9.80 (Windows NT 5.1; U; zh-cn) Presto/2.9.168 Version/11.50',
'Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; SV1; QQDownload 732; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E; 360SE)',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; PPC Mac OS X; U; en) Opera 8.0',
'Opera/9.80 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6.8; U; en) Presto/2.8.131 Version/11.11',
'Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; Trident/5.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)',
'Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E; LBBROWSER)',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/21.0.1180.71 Safari/537.1 LBBROWSER',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1) Gecko/20070803 Firefox/1.5.0.12',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/537.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/21.0.1180.89 Safari/537.1',
'Opera/8.0 (Macintosh; PPC Mac OS X; U; en)',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/535.11 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/17.0.963.84 Safari/535.11 SE 2.X MetaSr 1.0',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.2) Gecko/2008070208 Firefox/3.0.1',
'Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; Trident/5.0;',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:18.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/18.0',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/537.17 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/24.0.1312.57 Safari/537.17',
'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/537.17 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/24.0.1312.57 Safari/537.17 QIHU 360EE'
)
//these are the domains they are hitting
//AND serverName IN (
//'mobile.365-838.com',
//'members.365-838.com',
//'members.7788365365.com')


GROUP BY sip
HAVING sum (CASE WHEN uname <> 'Not Available' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 // not completed login,
AND sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 // at least one Validate Username request

ORDER BY count(*) DESC

SELECT sip, count(distinct sip) as IPAddresses, count(distinct stk) as SessionTokens, count(distinct uname) as Usernames, 
sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() NOT LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as OpenAccount,
sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ValidateUsername,
sum (CASE WHEN uname <> 'Not Available' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as CompletedLogin,
current_timestamp().format() as Time,
referer || ',' || userAgent || ',' || serverName || ',' || loginDomain || ',' || tags as CombinedAttributes
FROM NewLoginDefault.win:time(1 minute)
WHERE uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/%'       //all open account requests
GROUP BY referer || ',' || userAgent || ',' || serverName || ',' || loginDomain || ',' || tags
HAVING sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 84 //validate account hits
AND sum (CASE WHEN uname <> 'Not Available' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)  < 1 //completed login
OUTPUT all every 10 seconds
//ORDER BY sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DESC
//LIMIT 10

AND sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= 15   //validate username
OUTPUT last every 10 seconds
ORDER BY count(*) DESC
liveMonitors.queryDescription: Validate User Name Open Account Attack - 15 or more validate user name hits in 5 minutes and not completing registration

SELECT count(distinct sip) as IPAddresses, count(distinct stk) as SessionTokens, count(distinct uname) as Usernames, 
sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() NOT LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as OpenAccount,
sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ValidateUsername,
sum (CASE WHEN uname <> 'Not Available' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as CompletedLogin,

referer || ',' || userAgent || ',' || serverName || ',' || loginDomain || ',' || tags as CombinedAttributes

WHERE uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/%'       //all open account requests
GROUP BY referer || ',' || userAgent || ',' || serverName || ',' || loginDomain || ',' || tags

ORDER BY sum (CASE WHEN uri.toLowerCase() LIKE '/members/services/openaccount/validateusername%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DESC
LIMIT 10

liveMonitors.queryBody:
select count(*) as numHits, sip, sldName, uri, userAgent, stk, orgName, carrierName, city, country, xForwardedFor  from betslip.win:time(1 seconds)
where userAgent in (
'http://anype.com',
'Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; Win32; WinHttp.WinHttpRequest.5)', // added by John Snow 21st Feb 2017
// 'Pingdom.com_bot_version_1.4_(http://www.pingdom.com/)',
'Symfony2 BrowserKit',
//  Bare the following in mind
// 'NativeHost',                                          // this is a windows phone app and could be valid
//  'facebookexternalhit/1.0 (+http://www.facebook.com/externalhit_uatext.php)',  // double check this it could just be people linking to the site
'YisouSpider',
'SiteUptime.com',
'Symfony2 BrowserKit',
'Java/1.8.0_91',
'Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; bingbot/2.0; +http://www.bing.com/bingbot.htm)',
'Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; DotBot/1.1; http://www.opensiteexplorer.org/dotbot, help@moz.com)',
''
)
OR userAgent LIKE '%Headless%'
OR userAgent LIKE 'Apache-HttpClient%'
OR userAgent LIKE 'Wget/%'
OR userAgent LIKE 'MetaURI API/%'
OR userAgent LIKE 'Twitterbot%'
OR userAgent LIKE '%ython%'    // Python bots
OR userAgent LIKE '%perl%'
OR userAgent Like '%PhantomJS%'
OR userAgent LIKE '%WWW-Mechanize%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%snoopy%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%okhttp%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE 'guzzlehttp%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%restsharp%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%scrapy%'
//////OR userAgent LIKE 'bet365Wrapper%'     //  ---- DON'T DO THIS it's normal for the iPhone to make a request with bet365Wrapper at the start of the string.
//OR userAgent LIKE '%http://www.webserv-me.com%'
OR userAgent regexp ".*MSIE [0-9]+\\.[0-9]{2,};.*"   // looks for randomised MSIE value
OR userAgent LIKE 'Go-http-client%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%.py %' //python bots
group by sip
output last every 1 seconds
liveMonitors.queryDescription: Monitor a number of misc web bot user agent strings Duplicate of: user-agent-web-bots-mob Duplicate of: user-agent-web-bots-bettingslip

OR userAgent LIKE 'Apache-HttpClient%'
OR userAgent LIKE 'Wget/%'
OR userAgent LIKE 'MetaURI API/%'
OR userAgent LIKE 'Twitterbot%'
OR userAgent LIKE '%ython%'    // Python bots
OR userAgent LIKE '%perl%'
OR userAgent Like '%PhantomJS%'
OR userAgent LIKE '%WWW-Mechanize%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%snoopy%'
//OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%okhttp%' - commented out 16/06/18 due to call out from ots - blocking users for bingo
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE 'guzzlehttp%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%restsharp%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%scrapy%'
//////OR userAgent LIKE 'bet365Wrapper%'     //  ---- DON'T DO THIS it's normal for the iPhone to make a request with bet365Wrapper at the start of the string.
//OR userAgent LIKE '%http://www.webserv-me.com%'
OR userAgent regexp ".*MSIE [0-9]+\\.[0-9]{2,};.*"   // looks for randomised MSIE value
OR userAgent LIKE 'Go-http-client%'
OR userAgent.toLowerCase() LIKE '%.py %' //python bots
group by sip
output last every 1 seconds
